General.Name: Earth-Panda Advanced Magnetic Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Earth-Panda Advanced Magnetic Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and operation of rare-earth permanent magnetic materials in China. It offers sintered NdFeB, samarium cobalt permanent, and rubber magnets, as well as magnetic assemblies. Its products are used in various fields, such as automobile, industrial motor and high-end consumer electronics, new energy, automobile drive motors, wind power generation, industrial robots, 5G, 3C, and other. The company also exports its products to approximately 20 countries and regions, including Europe, the United States, and Asia-Pacific. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.
General.Address: Lujiang High-Tech Industrial Dev Zn, Hefei, China, 231500
